price: (Fir‘aon) wí fún àwọn ìjòyè tí wọ́n wà ní àyíká rẹ̀ pé: “Dájúdájú èyí ni onímọ̀ nípa idán pípa.
arabic: قَالَ لِلۡمَلَإِ حَوۡلَهُۥٓ إِنَّ هَٰذَا لَسَٰحِرٌ عَلِيمٞ

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: qāla lil'mala-i ḥawlahu inna hādhā lasāḥirun ʿalīmun
